name: Mesh Arena
description:
Gameplay

Build your mesh with weapon and frame.
Fight in arena for survive at more ennemies wave. 

Control

Use e,s,d,f for move and mouse  for target and fire.

Made with
  • Love2d + love.js (Framework + Build tool)
  • zerobrane studio (IDE)
  • Krita (Drawing)
  • Graphics and code : Oblerion
  • Font Softball  : Eeve Somepx

Publish date : 15/2/23 6.00 pm
